text: Montague was an American Thoroughbred racehorse. He won the 1890 Preakness Stakes. ==References== Category:Thoroughbred family 12-b Category:Racehorses bred in the United States Category:Racehorses trained in the United States Category:Preakness Stakes winners Category:1885 racehorse births Category:Byerley Turk sire line
title: Montague (horse)
